plot: Filmmaker/Sailor Lee Stanley sails around the world encountering people that have "cut the ties" with society as we know it and started a new life or career in some of the most beautiful and secluded places.
title: Dream Chasers
plot_es: Filmmaker/Sailor Lee Stanley sails around the world encountering people that have "cut the ties" with society as we know it and started a new life or career in some of the most beautiful and secluded places.
plot_en: Filmmaker/Sailor Lee Stanley sails around the world encountering people that have "cut the ties" with society as we know it and started a new life or career in some of the most beautiful and secluded places.
